author: MHLoppy
description: Automatically post daily weather forecasts; Get current weather for specified city. Based on weather cog by TrustyJAID
end_user_data_statement: This cog may store User ID's for the purposes of setting default preferred temperature units.
install_msg: Primary commands: `[p]autopost location`, `[p]shortweather location`. See GitHub repo for more details.
name: Autopost
